attributes.action: Bring an end to the meat, dairy, egg and fishing industries.
attributes.additional_details: We do not need to consume meat, dairy, fish or eggs in order to lead healthy lives at any part of our development, including infancy, throughout pregnancy and into old age. Give livestock farmers financial backing and practical support to switch to arable farming. Animal agriculture is destroying the planet and is cruel. Reverse de-foresation; reclaim the land and the oceans. Recover lost/discarded fishing nets. Redeploy fishermen and women to revitalise our oceans instead of plundering them.
attributes.background: These industries are dependent on cruelty and killing and at the same time are killing our planet as well as significantly contributing to individual ill health. By continuing to indulge in these ill-gotten luxuries we are threatening our own existence as well as that of all other species on earth.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure exactly what you want to happen to bring an end to these industries.

For example, we're not sure whether you want a ban on the farming, production and sales of meat, dairy products, eggs and fish and/or ban their consumption, or whether you want to support farmers convert to arable farming. We're also not sure what you want the Government or Parliament to do to redeploy fishermen and women to revitalise our oceans. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
